What is the material of the coat? it’s a very soft polyester material, just like an actual teddy bear. And actually quite warm. Does it have a smell？Should I wash before wear？ There’s no smell ... it comes vacuum sealed so it’s a little wrinkled. Is it fuzzy on the inside too? Yes it’s the same material on the inside as the outside. How do you wash it without it getting ruined? Wash it with cold water and then let it air dry. How warm is it? Very warm! It is fuzzy inside and out. I've been wearing it as a coat and it keeps me warm (it's been in the 50's here.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Softess jacket ever
reviews.reviewText: I like everything about it. True to size, seems well made, very soft, and amazingly warm. Great color too. I got the light lavender. It is almost a greige color, but outdoor lighting brings out the lavender.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Soft, stylish, and comfortable jacket. Liked it very much. Keeps me warm!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I really like this jacket. I got the khaki - which is more orangey than it sounds. Really good color. It arrives vacuum sealed and feels like a board, but as soon as you open and remove it from the sealed package, it starts to take shape. I washed mine immediately to see how it fared. Washed in cold and dried on low setting. No problems with washing / drying. I have worn a couple of times now and have had no issues with fuzz getting on my clothes - like some other reviews claimed. The zipper is awful - which I expected based on other reviews. Cheap and catches in the fuzz of the jacket, so difficult to zip. That is why I gave only 4 stars. The jacket is unlined, so just as soft on the inside as it is on the outside. Very warm despite being unlined. I usually wear a medium in most tops and ordered the large for an oversized fit. I like the way it fits - big and cozy. For reference, I am about 5'5" and 140 pounds. I have ordered another color at this point and am considering a 3rd - maybe with a hood. All in all, I think it is a good value for the price (I paid about $32).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it! Buy it now
reviews.reviewText: Wow, this jacket is lightweight but it keeps you warm. I wore it casually and also dressed it up a lil for work. Super cozy! Happy with the purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was very inexpensive but it fits great, the zipper works, and I am very happy I decided to buy it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Comfy, but not made well
reviews.reviewText: I love how warm this coat is. I love the color and the texture (very soft). I recommend ordering a size up like I did, otherwise it would have been snug.The reason I rated down two stars is the zipper. The zipper does not work well at all. It's loose and difficult to move up and down. I can tell it won't hold up long even after just a few weeks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This jacket is warm. It’s also so cozy and comfortable and fuzzy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This jacket is ultra comfortable although the pockets are quite small I have small hands, and they barely cover the knuckles, but other than that very roomy and comfy comfy

reviews.reviewTitle: Sugiero pedir una talla más grande
reviews.reviewText: Tenía muchas dudas respecto a la talla correcta que debería elegir ya que leí muchísimas opiniones opuestas.Este abrigo lo compré para mi mamá, ya que ella estaba buscando algo que fuera cómodo y que por supuesto la cubriera del frío.Pero temía que no le quedara, ya que anteriormente le pedí una chamarra de su talla (XL) pero no le cerraba en el área del busto.Debo decir que ella mide aproximadamente 1.70 y pesa 83 kilos. Así que me arriesgué pidiendo una talla más grande que la que usa habitualmente, y le quedó perfecta.El material es super suave y cómodo. Lo único que no me gustó es que el zipper se siente frágil, además que es un poco complicado subirlo, pero bueno, cambiando el zipper por uno de mayor calidad se soluciona el problema.

reviews.reviewTitle: Get the larger size if you want it to look like the picture
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this jacket in a large in order to have that loose, oversized fit. I'm 5'6'' and 125-130Ilbs. I usually get smalls in jackets but wanted this to be much over-sized to fit todays trend. I ordered a large and am keeping it! It look like the picture and has a soft, teddy-bear like feel. Great for layering in fall or with a heavy sweater (which works with the over size of it). I could have gone with a medium and it still would have looked fashionable and on trend, but I will keep the large.UPDATE- Still in love with it. I work in a high school, and have teenagers commenting on the jacket. They all think it is from Aritzia, and are shocked to learn how much I actually spent. Still fits great, looks great and have not had any issues thus far.

Ist keine 5 Euro wert. Kam ohne Box, sondern in einer winzigen Vakuumtüte. War entsprechend zerknittert und zerranzt. Stoff ist sehr dünn und von billiger Qualität. Aufgrund der Tüte ist eine Rücksendung sehr kompliziert wenn nicht unmöglich. Nie wieder!

Had low expectations because I read the poor reviews primarily. But this met my expectations especially for the price. Is it the highest quality? No. It’s true what they say about the zipper being fiddly. But mine arrived fluffy and clean and soft. I put it in the dryer on air-only setting to get any dust and loose fabric out and it’s been great since. I am tempted to wear it everywhere because it’s so cold right now but I got the light pink one and it isn’t exactly the most chic color for my coloring. it’s a very light baby pink and looks more like a house coat unless i dress it up properly with shoes and accessories. I am 5’6 and 118 lbs and I got the extra large. Its very roomy which is what I wanted. It covers my bum and the arm length is perfect. I am tempted to get another color because I really want to wear it everywhere and not just at the grocery store or during the school run. But I already have too many jackets. Disclaimer: I haven’t washed it yet so I don’t know if quality will hold up. But extended wear hasn’t made it deteriorate yet.

Super me encantó. Es muy calientito. Pachoncito. Lo pedí en talla 2xl porque lo uso para arroparme en casa, teniendo un suéter sencillo abajo. Generalmente uso tallas 38 ó 40 en Mexico. Viene amplio. De hecho he pedido otro más, en talla grande para que sirva más para vestir, más justoLo recomiendo.
